reviewDetails.comment: Do not go to this office if you have any concerns about the cost of service. They quoted my insurance one amount for a procedure then billed us double. Months and dozens of phone calls have continued on without their willingness to take ownership of their mistake or make the bill right. Find an honest office to go to.

reviewDetails.comment: Very nice and good with our 2.5 year old. Was knowledgeable and easy to understand.
Very friendly staff, and knowledgeable Dr. Our first visit he didn't know much about [PERSONAL INFO]'s condition, so he actually talked to our neurologist before this one.
He is very nice ,friendly and expert doctor. I really recommend Dr.Kelly.

reviewDetails.comment: This doctor, did not seem interested in what I was explaining about my issue. He examined me and wrote a prescription, done, I waited for along time to see him, he took about 6 minutes to see me.
Dr. Chang is professional and kind.
Dr. Chang is always kind and professional with a good sense of humor.

I have seen this doc in the past and he was more focused than the last visit. He seemed rushed, distracted and disinterested. The office front desk was rude. They seemed short staffed and patient care seems secondary to having people rushed in and out. May be time to find a new provider. (He also didnt seem to want to answer questions).

Very good experience.
From making appointment to running on time at the time of the visit.
Very organized office and one that i would revisit again in the future.
